headline: Yum China unveils AI tool in a bid to boost efficiency
summary: Yum China Holdingssaid on Friday it has launched a new AI-enabledhands-free assistant tool at certain KFC stores in a bid toboost efficiency. The company, which operates Yum Brands'...

headline: CFOs On the Move: Week ending June 20
summary: Vodafone appoints a Microsoft exec as CFO, Yum Brands promotes its chief financial officer to CEO and Sonoco names a new finance chief.
